text: [Vspomnite,] kak My vzyali s vas klyatvu i vozdvigli pred vami goru Sinay i veleli: "Derzhites' krepko za to, chto My vam darovali, i slushayte". Oni otvetili: "My slyshali i otkazyvayemsya povinovat'sya". Iz-za neveriya ikh serdtsa preispolnilis' lyubov'yu k tel'tsu. Skazhi [, o Mukhammad]: "Merzko to, chto velit vam [eta] vasha vera, yesli vy zhelayete byt' [istinno] veruyushchimi
